onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) - Method in class com.example.books4share.fragment.HomeFragment
get the data bundle from the intent activity if the bundle is null, no action performed if bundle is not null and the scan-camera/CodeUtills(the scan tool from zxinglibrary) returns a true result we call getBookbyISBN function else this will toast a message noticing user scan failed
onBindViewHolder(BookAdapter.ViewHolder, int) - Method in class com.example.books4share.adapter.BookAdapter
